meanings.definition: A person who plans and coordinates events or activities.
meanings.sent1: The organiser of the party made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The school organiser scheduled the field trip for next week.
meanings.sent3: The organiser forgot to book a venue for the event, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: She was the organiser of the family reunion, bringing everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The wedding organiser transformed the venue into a fairytale setting.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to arrange or store items in an orderly manner.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new organiser to keep my desk tidy.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen organiser helped keep the pots and pans organized.
meanings.sent3: The organiser in my drawer is overflowing with pens and pencils.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a magical organiser, fitting everything perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The closet organiser made finding clothes in the morning much easier.
